titles.title: Child Support and Custody Jurisdiction Reform Act of 1993
A bill to amend section 1738A of title 28, United States Code, relating to child custody determinations and child support orders, to modify the requirements for court jurisdiction.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2549-2550)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 3/9/1993--Introduced. Child Support and Custody Jurisdiction Reform Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal judicial code to require each State to give full faith and credit to child support orders made by a court of another State.
